article_title: Hillary makes presidential campaign stop in Ashland
article_text:
Huntington, WV (25701)

Today

Chance of late night showers.

Tonight

Partly cloudy skies this evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers late. Thunder possible. Low 64F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

article_metadata.author:
DAVID E. MALLOY
The Herald-Dispatch
dmalloy@herald-dispatch.com

og.description: In an area hard-hit by job losses in the steel, coal and railroad industries, Democratic presidential hopeful Hillary Clinton made a campaign stop Monday in Ashland.
og.title: Hillary makes presidential campaign stop in Ashland
